Package net.tangly.erp.crm.domain

package net.tangly.erp.crm.domain
Provides core abstractions used in any commercial application in need of customer relation management entities. The cornerstone of the package are the set of CRM entities, natural and legal entities and the employee relation between a legal and natural entity.

The customer relationship management package is designed as a bounded domain.

  • Class
    Description
    Activity
    An activity is an action between a seller and a potential sellee.
    ActivityCode
    Defines the kinds of af activities between natural persons.
    Contract
    A legal contract between two parties, one being the seller and one being the sellee.
    Employee
    Defines an employee as a temporal work contract between a natural entity meaning a person and a legal entity meaning an organization or a company.
    Interaction
    Defines an interaction between your company and a legal entity and a group of natural entities.
    InteractionCode
    Defines the phases of an interaction between the seller and sellee organizations.
    Lead
    Defines a lead in the customer relation domain.
    LeadCode
    Defines the status of a lead.
    Subject
    Defines the abstraction of a registered subject entitled to use the application and associated services.
